channel.title: 3mpwr App - Curated Disability News
channel.description: Daily curated news on disability rights, accessibility, and benefits across Canada

item.title: Ontario crossing guard killed while on the job after being hit by vehicle
item.description: The victim was identified by police as a 52-year-old Hamilton resident who served as a City of Hamilton crossing guard. He died at the scene, police said.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Manitoba Government Adds $1 Million to Accelerate Construction of Park Community Centre and Child-Care Facility in Brandon

item.title: Manitoba Government Invests $100,000 to Replace Brandon University Observatory Dome

item.title: Manitoba Government Delivers on Promises to Make Communities Safer
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: On Our Radar: Buddie turns its completely understandable stress into something beautiful
item.description: Guitar bands are back in Vancouver, and itâ€™s beautiful.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: B.C. Attorney General 'deeply disturbed' by social media giant X's intimate image case
item.description: British Columbia's Attorney General says she's "deeply disturbed" that the social media company X has filed a legal challenge against an order to remove a non-consensual intimate image from the internet.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Fall drought could spell water troubles for central Alberta regions, expert says
item.description: Large swaths of Alberta are experiencing extreme drought conditions. Some farmers are thinking twice about the amount of water they use heading into the winter months.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator

item.title: Major projects list has some Indigenous support, but more needed: Carney
item.description: Prime Minister Mark Carney says his list of major projects has received support from some Indigenous groups, but more will be needed.
item.dc:creator: 3mpwr App Curator
